extractionHint.notes: Extract the date or date expression following this phrase. May be a concrete date or a relative expression (e.g., '364 days after the Closing Date').

extractionHint.pattern: (aggregate amount of .*Commitments is|aggregate amount of the .*Commitments is|aggregate amount of .*Commitment is|aggregate amount of the .*Commitment is)
extractionHint.notes: Extract the monetary commitment amount stated in the definition.
Extract all section, schedule, or appendix references appearing in the definition.
Extract the rate definition text from the block after this phrase (often a formula or multi-part calculation). Return exactly what appears.

extractionHint.pattern: with respect to any ABR Loan
extractionHint.notes: Extract the margin applicable to ABR Loans.

extractionHint.pattern: with respect to any Eurodollar Loan
extractionHint.notes: Extract the margin applicable to Eurodollar Loans.

extractionHint.pattern: with respect to any SOFR Loan
extractionHint.notes: Extract the margin applicable to SOFR Loans.
